title: Sony SRSXB40 Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description:
In this video we take a look at the SRSXB40 portable bluetooth speaker from Sony.  For more details or to place an order please visit us at Abt.com: http://www.abt.com/resources/pages/search.php?keywords=srsxb40&utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=SRSXB40_20170420

Features:
- Feel the music with EXTRA BASS: Hit the EXTRA BASS button to get things going. Dual passive radiators work together with stereo full-range speakers to enhance low-end tones, giving bass a boost — despite the compact size.
- Build energy with flashy lights: Get the atmosphere right with a multicolored line light and flashing strobe.
- Bring the bass — wherever you go: The wireless SRS-XB40 is easy to move. With a long battery life and a water-resistant surface, you're free to pick it up and put it anywhere.  
- Water-resistant design: Whether you're listening to tunes indoors or outdoors, you can relax knowing the wireless speaker is IPX5 water-resistant.
- Up to 24 hours of battery life: Play music all day and night with up to 24 hours of battery life. The voice feedback function tells you the remaining battery level and when it's time to recharge.
- Small and light design: Thanks to its compact size, you can pick up the speaker, pop it in your bag, and take it anywhere you want.
- Get things booming with Wireless Party Chain: Enjoy the same song with Wireless Party Chain. Connect up to 10 wireless speakers via Bluetooth® and synchronize the music and lighting so everyone's dancing to the same beat. 
- Add an extra speaker for room-filling stereo sound: Simply connect two wireless speakers for wider stereo sound.
- Easy control with SongPal: Manage your music quickly and easily from your smartphone with SongPal. Simply install the app and take control of music, lights, and more.
- Fun, easy control via the Fiestable app: Take charge of playback, speaker lights and DJ sound effects all from your smartphone with the Fiestable app. 
- Better Bluetooth: LDAC transmits approximately three times more data (at the maximum transfer rate: 990 kbps) than conventional Bluetooth® audio for a superior wireless listening experience.
- One-touch listening with NFC: Simply touch your NFC-enabled smartphone to the speaker and get the beats going.
- Get connected with USB: Connect your smartphone via USB for battery charging.
- Multi-device connection: Multi-device connection Connect up to three devices and play your favorite tunes in turn.
